00020 class InvertFilter: public Filter {
00021 
00022     public:
00023     virtual void filter(Picture * image) {
00024         int height = image->getHeight();
00025         int width = image->getWidth();
00026 
00027         Pixel temp;
00028         for(int h = 0; h < height/2; h++) {
00029             for(int w = 0; w < width; w++) {
00030                 temp = image->getPixel(w,h);
00031                 image->setPixel(w,h, image->getPixel(w,(height-1)-h));
00032                 image->setPixel(w,(height-1)-h,temp);
00033             }
00034         }
00035     }
00036 
00037     private:
00038 };
00039 
00040 class LightMask: public Filter {
00041     
00042     public:
00043 
00044     virtual void filter(Picture * image) {
00045 
00046         //int color_mode = getColorMode();
00047         //if(color_mode)
00048         //    return;
00049 
00050         int imageHeight = image->getHeight();
00051         int imageWidth  = image->getWidth();
00052 
00053         int numPartitions = 4;
00054         int partition_width = imageWidth/numPartitions;
00055 
00056         int shadePartition;
00057         double brightEst = 0;
00058         int partition_sum[6] = {0,0,0,0,0,0};
00059 
00060         // Sum up each partition
00061         for(int y = 0; y < imageHeight; y++) {
00062             for(int partition = 0; partition < numPartitions; partition++) {
00063                 for(int x = partition*partition_width; x < (partition+1)*partition_width; x++) {
00064                     //partion[j] += image[(h * imageWidth) + (h * partition_width) + k];
00065                     Pixel pix = image->getPixel(x,y);
00066                     partition_sum[partition] += pix.R + pix.G + pix.B;
00067                 }
00068             }
00069         }
00070 
00071         // Determine which partition is the brightest
00072         shadePartition = 0;
00073         brightEst = partition_sum[0]/(imageHeight * partition_width);
00074         for(int i = 1; i < numPartitions; i++) {
00075             if( partition_sum[i]/(imageHeight * partition_width) > brightEst ) {
00076                 shadePartition = i;
00077                 brightEst = partition_sum[i]/(imageHeight * partition_width);
00078             }
00079         }
00080 
00081         Pixel black = {0,0,0};
00082         // Make every region thats not the drawn one black
00083         for(int y = 0; y < imageHeight; y++) {
00084             for(int partition = 0; partition < numPartitions; partition++) {
00085                 if ( partition != shadePartition ){
00086                     for(int x = partition*partition_width; x < (partition+1)*partition_width; x++) {
00087                         image->setPixel(x,y,black);
00088                     }
00089                 }
00090             }
00091         }
00092     }
00093 
00094 };

00096 int main(int argc, char ** argv) {
00097 
00098     int color_mode = -1;
00099     int enableInvert = 0;
00100     int enableLightMask = 0;
00101 
00102     if(argc < 2) {
00103         fprintf(stderr, 
00104                 "Usuage: ./video_stream color|gray invert|light|none\n");
00105         return -1;
00106     }
00107     else if(!strcmp(argv[1], "color")) {
00108         color_mode = 1;
00109     }
00110     else if(!strcmp(argv[1], "gray")) {
00111         color_mode = 0;
00112     }
00113     else {
00114         fprintf(stderr, 
00115                 "Usuage: ./video_stream color|gray invert|light|none\n");
00116         return -1;
00117     }
00118 
00119     if(argc < 5 && argc > 2) {
00120         if(!strcmp(argv[2], "invert"))
00121             enableInvert = 1;
00122         else if(!strcmp(argv[2], "light"))
00123             enableLightMask = 1;
00124         else if(strcmp(argv[2], "none"))
00125             fprintf(stderr, "Invalid Filter Opition\n");
00126 
00127         if(argc > 3) {
00128             if(!strcmp(argv[3], "invert"))
00129                 enableInvert = 1;
00130             else if(!strcmp(argv[3], "light"))
00131                 enableLightMask = 1;
00132             else if(strcmp(argv[3], "none"))
00133                 fprintf(stderr, "Invalid Filter Opition\n");
00134         }
00135     }
00136 
00137     connect();
00138 
00139     InvertFilter * myInvertFilter;
00140     LightMask * myLightMask;
00141     VideoStream video(&robot, color_mode);
00142 
00143     if(enableInvert) {
00144         myInvertFilter = new InvertFilter();
00145         video.addFilter(myInvertFilter);
00146     }
00147     if(enableLightMask) {
00148         myLightMask = new LightMask();
00149         video.addFilter(myLightMask);
00150     }
00151 
00152     //while(true){
00153     video.startStream();
00154 
00155     int close = 0;
00156     std::string quit;
00157     while(!close) {
00158         std::cout << "Type in E or Exit to quit\n";
00159         std::cin >> quit;
00160         if(quit == "E" || quit == "Exit" || quit == "e" || quit == "exit")
00161             close = 1;
00162     }
00163     video.endStream();
00164     //sleep(5);
00165     //std::cout << "restarting" << std::endl;
00166     //}
00167     disconnect();
00168     if(enableInvert)
00169         delete myInvertFilter;
00170     if(enableLightMask)
00171         delete myLightMask;
00172     return 1;
00173 }
